Eight candidates are vying for five seats on the nine-member board.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

As an ACLU member living in a nine-county area in eastern Iowa, you automatically are also a member of the Hawkeye Chapter, the only ACLU chapter in Iowa.

Board members are elected, and from now until the deadline of Sunday, July 28, you have the opportunity to cast your vote.

Find out more about the candidates and to cast your vote.

Important note: You will need your membership number to vote. Your membership number: ##account_number[No membership number on file.]##.

Your membership number is also on your ACLU membership card. If you have any problems finding your membership number, please contact us at ellen.simmons@aclu-ia.org or call 515-243-3988, ext. 113.

Best,

ACLU of Iowa
